Suggested page title{#suggestedTitle}Does the page need to go on the website or intranet?{whereDoesThePage}

@af:if({whereDoesThePage} = 'yes')
Which section of the website or intranet does this page need to go for example: Rubbish and Recycling, Learning and Schools, etc. {whichSection}
@endaf:if

@endaf:if
@af:if({isPage} = 'yes')
Enter link {enter}
@endaf:if
@af:if({typeOfRequest} = 'New page request')
Who is the content for? {whoIs}
@endaf:if

@endaf:if
@af:if({typeOfRequest} = 'Amend an existing page')
Reason for change {reasonForChange}
@endaf:if
@af:if({typeOfRequest} != '')
Tell us when the change needs to go live {tellUsWhen}
@endaf:if
@af:if({typeOfRequest} = 'Amend an existing page')
Insert link to the page to be amended {insertLinkToTheP}
Select what you want to change/add to the page {selectWhatYouWant}
@endaf:if
@af:if({selectWhatYouWant} = 'other')

Please provide more information on the amendments you'd like us to make to the page

{#pleaseDescribeWhat}

@endaf:if
@af:if({selectWhatYouWant} = 'a link')

@endaf:if
@af:if({selectWhatYouWant} = 'a section')

Insert title of section followed by new text

{#insertTitle}

@endaf:if
@af:if({selectWhatYouWant} = 'a link')

@endaf:if

Insert content

{#insertContent}

{features}

@endaf:if
